task.summary: Default task
Added a CrimeFragment to CrimeActivity.java
Initial completion of widget for entering crime title.
Added date and a boolean to Crime class.
Updated layout to contain 2 TextView, 1 Button and 1 CheckBox.
Set Button to display date and a listener for CheckBox changes.
Updated the date displayed on Button to a more readable version.
Completed CrimeLab through Listing 9.3
Completed the SingleFragmentActivity implemntation
Implemented a new controller class CrimeListActivity as subclass of SingleFragmentActivity.
Set CrimeActivity as sublcass of new SingleFragmentActivity abstract class.
New controller class fragment for a CrimeList.
Set CrimeListActivity as the launcher activity.
Modified CrimeListFragment to use the newly created fragment_crime_list View.
Defined the ViewHolder.
Define the inner Adapter class and it's methods.
Set Adapter on the RecyclerView via updateUI() method.
Created a custom list item layout for displaying a crime.
Updated to use the new list_item_crime layout.
Modified CrimeHolder to find the title TextView , date TextView , and solved.
Implemented bindCrime method.
Connected CrimeAdapter to CrimeHolder.
Changed RelativelyLayout layout_height attributes to wrap_content to fix large spacing between list items.
Completed Chapter 9.
User click on a list item now opens the item View.
Put an Intent as an extra with the crime's ID.
Listing 10.6...wrote a newInstance(UUID) method.
Update to retrieve UUID from new fragment arguments.
Updated to reload the list when returning from a CrimeActivity.
Updated to reload the list when returning from a CrimeActivity.
Updated to reload the list when returning from a CrimeActivity.
Listing 11.5 completed. Added CrimePagerActivity to manifest deleted CrimeActivity.
11.6 Set initial pager item to correct display correct item.
12.2 Created DatePickerFragment extends DialogFragment class and defined onCreateDialog(Bundle).
12.4 Added the DatePicker to the AlertDialog
12.4 Added the DatePicker to the AlertDialog
12.7 Extracted the date and initialized DatePicker.
12.10 Implemented DialogInterface.OnClickListener to retrieve the selected date and call sendResult.
12.12 Cleaned up by extracting the method updateDate().
Added comments and cleaned code.
Added comments and cleaned code.
Created skeleton for implementing user dialog to select time of day.
